thread.section_title: Man spotted going skinny dipping in the Thames on hottest day of the year – Metro
thread.title: Man spotted going skinny dipping in the Thames on hottest day of the year
thread.title_full: Man spotted going skinny dipping in the Thames on hottest day of the year

author: Richard Hartley-Parkinson
title: Man spotted going skinny dipping in the Thames on hottest day of the year
text:
A man thought it was warm enough to go for a dip (Picture: Fameflynet) Spring may not quite be here yet, but that doesn’t stop this guy from taking a dip in the River Thames.
He was spotted taking off his clothes yesterday on the hottest day of the year so far (not difficult considering it’s only March).
And with the mercury rising to the positively furnace like conditions of 19°C in the South East, who can blame him?
We aren’t quite sure who he is, but we hope he’s had a good wash since then.
Temperatures reached 19°C in London yesterday (Picture: Fameflynet) The question on everyone’s lips now is will it be warm enough to do it again this week?
In short: No.
It’s going to be a mild weekend but with not much sunshine in London.
A band of rain will make its way down the country over on Saturday, but whether we get punched in the face by Storm Stella is yet to be seen.
